comments.body: Quote from: royalfestus on August 24, 2022, 06:23:17 PMI struggled to find the twitter handle for this project and is not posted here, those who like to followed can @standard.io. The bounty has started accordinf to the OP and is limited. I like to put it to bounty manager like it used to be before if he can request that bounty hunters for the project to make at least a post every week to keep the thread active, informed and stay up on the annoucement thread.
